item.description:
http://www.thehallatpatriotplace.com/exhibits/

  •  Adults $10
  •  Seniors and Active Military with ID $7

 

 

The Hall at Patriot Place presented by Raytheon is an exciting, innovative and interactive, modern museum experience for all ages. The Kraft family long considered the best way to honor the greatest Patriots of all time while simultaneously preserving Patriots history.

The Hall is a modern “museum” that takes guests through Patriots and New England football history in a cutting-edge way, utilizing amazing video and audio to tap into fans’ emotions in a manner never before seen in a sports museum.

Oh, and you’ll put your finger in a Super Bowl XXXIX ring and get up close with the Patriots three Vince Lombardi Super Bowl Trophies while confetti rains down upon you.

Meeting Location: Panera Bread 400 Franklin St Braintree

This is a new Panera Bread at Braintree 5 corners, across from a Dunkin Donuts.

Meeting Time: 930 am to leave by 10 am

We will carpool to Foxboro and there are many places to eat at Patriots Place.

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: The Hall at Patriots Place
